page.title: 13TYPICAL DAY OF A 15 YR.OLD
page.content: I usually get up at 7a.m..I wash and put on my uniform and go downstairs. While eating my cornflakes, I watch 'T.V.A.M.'on television. Having cleaned my teeth and sorted my school books out, I get my bike out and cycle to school, which starts at 8.55. During the day, I will go to my locker several times to change my books and equipment. At 11.55, we have lunch- break. I usually eat sandwiches, a pork pie, crisps, and a chocolate bar. I usually have a drink at morning and afternoon break. At 3.35 school ends and if I do not have an afternoon club I go home. I watch Television for a while, then do my homework for a couple of hours. I have my dinner and watch television again. Finally I go for a run, have a shower and go to bed at about 9.30p.m.
